function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for the transmission of contagious diseases through interconnected devices and networks.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreak in built environments.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, along with regular disinfection of IoT devices and networks.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for real-time monitoring of cleanliness and air quality, IoT-based contactless interfaces for device control.","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in built environments.","Owner":"Health authorities, facility managers, IoT technology providers."}]}
